```{python}
from plotnine import *
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd

q1 = pd.read_csv("q1data.csv")
```
```{python}
q1 = q1[q1["year"] == 2010]
q1 = q1.dropna()
q1
```
```{python}
#Help from AI to find size continuous theme 
plot = (
    ggplot(q1, aes(x='income', y='life_exp', color='four_regions', size='population')) +
    geom_point(alpha=1) +
    scale_size_continuous(range=[2, 12], guide=guide_legend(title='Population')) +
    scale_color_brewer(type='qual', palette='Set2') +
    labs(
        x='Income',
        y='Life expectancy'
    ) +
    theme_minimal(base_size=12) +
    theme(
        figure_size=(10,6),
        panel_grid_major=element_line(color='#e0e0e0'),
        legend_position='right'
    )
)
```
```{python}
plot
```


```{python}
q2 = pd.read_csv("q2data.csv")
q2 = q2[q2["year"] == 1997]
q2 = q2.dropna()
q2['energy'] = pd.to_numeric(q2['energy'], errors='coerce')

```
```{python}
plot2 = (
    ggplot(q2, aes(x='exports', y='imports', color='four_regions', size='energy')) +
    geom_point(alpha=1) +
    scale_size_continuous(range=[2, 12], guide=guide_legend(title='Energy')) +
    scale_x_continuous(limits=(0,220)) +
    scale_y_continuous(limits=(0,400)) +
    scale_color_brewer(type='qual', palette='Set2') +
    labs(
        x='Exports (\% of GDP)',
        y='Imports (\% of GDP)'
    ) +
    theme_minimal(base_size=12) +
    theme(
        figure_size=(10,6),
        panel_grid_major=element_line(color='#e0e0e0'),
        legend_position="right"
    )
)
```
```{python}
plot2
```
